detail_desc: Jacket in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and organic cotton blend with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Moisturising lip balm in a plastic pot with a lid. 3.7 g.
Imitation suede shoulder bag with a flap and metal fastener and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. One outer compartment and one inner compartment. Size approx. 8x12.5x23 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side. One patterned top and one in a solid colour.
Checked bucket hat in woven fabric. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.

Padded jacket with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and concealed zip with a wind flap and hook and loop fastening. Diagonal welt pockets with a concealed zip, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Blouse in airy organza with a jacquard-weave pattern. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, short, voluminous puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning. Lined with a V-neck top in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The top can be detached from the blouse.

Short, lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood, high collar, and zip and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in textured-knit jersey made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a wide waistband and straight legs with a gentle flare at the hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Shorts in soft, gently draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Soft jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with a hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Treggings in stretch twill with a small glittery heart at the top, an elasticated waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.
Leggings in washed, patterned stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Long jumper in a soft, textured knit with a ribbed polo neck, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long skirt in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip and button and high slit in one side. Short jersey inner skirt.
Fitted off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Saddle bag in imitation leather with a braided imitation straw finish. Imitation leather flap with decorative tabs and a metal ring at the front, a magnetic fastener, a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 5.5 cm. Height 13.5 cm. Width 19.5 cm.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
Pleated, V-neck blouse in an airy weave with pleats around the neckline, raglan, balloon sleeves, narrow cuffs with a covered button, and a detachable fabric belt at the waist. Relaxed fit.
Jacquard-weave jacket with fringe trims, notch lapels, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Boots in imitation leather with studs, pointed toes and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5 cm.
Strappy top in satin with lace details, narrow shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped, soft jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back and narrow shoulder straps.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a soft, fine knit with a wide foldover at the top and long sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets with buttons, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated smocking at the hems.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, frills over the shoulders, and narrow cuffs with a button and elasticated loop.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.

Soft, non-wired bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Double-breasted coat in a soft, checked felted wool blend with peak lapels, buttons down the front, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Short jacket in scuba fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and long raglan sleeves with wide ribbing and a thumbhole at the cuffs.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in sturdy satin with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in one side, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Round sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sturdy iPad case in grained imitation leather with a flap and magnetic fastener. Fits iPad Air, iPad Air 2 and iPad Pro 9.7”
Kaftan in an airy, patterned weave with buttons down the front and open sides held together by a button.
Jacket in a fine knit with a soft faux shearling lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and side pockets.
Set with a sleeveless romper suit and T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless romper suit in patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with fixed ties and a double-layered top. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elasticated frill trims at the hems.
Top in an airy viscose crêpe weave with a small frill around the neckline, short, frilled sleeves that slope downwards at the sides and a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
High-waisted suit trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and slim, tapered legs.
Short-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, zip with a ring pull at the top and narrow, covered elastication at the hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a boat neck, side panels, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with a decorative belt and shiny buttons.
Slim-fit, ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a slight sheen. Zip in the side and straight legs that flare at the hem.
Blouse in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated, trumpet cuffs with decorative bows. Short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a back section in ventilating mesh. Thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Dungarees in stretch organic cotton denim. with a chest pocket and straps with a press-stud fastening. Press-studs at the sides, a seam and belt loops at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Small metal hair clips in various glittery and shimmering designs. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Hat, mittens and tube scarf set in a soft jacquard knit. Hat with earflaps, a pompom on top and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Tube scarf with ribbed edges.
Skirt in several layers of glittery tulle with an elastic waistband. Lined.
Vest top in soft, cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and a rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scalloped cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined in a contrasting colour.
Hat and tube scarf in double-layered cotton jersey.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in lace and mesh with moulded, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Short, fine-knit socks designed to be hidden by your shoes. Ribbed section around the foot for best fit and elastication and a silicone trim at the back of the heel to keep them in place.
Shaping briefs in jersey with an extra-high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the tummy.
Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a zip at one side. Linings and insoles in satin made from recycled polyester, and chunky soles. Heel 2 cm.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Slightly wider neckline with a V-shaped opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, and smocking at the waist and cuffs.
